name: DateRangePicker.Input

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The field input component which contains the segments of the date field.

slots.name: builder
slots.description: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: The builder attributes and actions to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.

slots.name: segments
slots.description: An object containing the start and end segment arrays used to render the start and end segments of the date field.
slots.description_zh: An object containing the start and end segment arrays used to render the start and end segments of the date field.
